comment: She was amazing just very little description of what to do we only had three test a museum visit and then four modules... I only did two modules and got all As on the others cause the answers are on quizlet but this class was cake... take It online Though! She will make time for you and responds within reason overall shes amazing
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Seriously, she is the best. There were few students in my class. like 6, so it was hard not to participate. She is extremely knowledgeable of how to properly respond to your classroom and in my opinion an expert art teacher. There are few things that you are graded on as she focuses more on learning than on giving out grades.

Professor Munson's class was one of my favorite professors this semester. She does a great job of explaining art and how it be incorporated into different subjects. Each class was very relaxing. You will be amazed at how much she helps you become an artist. If you are debating taking art online or in-class, take this class with Professor Munson!

Dr. Munson is super chill and an all around great professor. I took her for an Art Education class for a maymester and enjoyed going to classes very much. Her class pretty much seemed like therapy, it was great!   SIDE NOTE: She makes an artist out of those who think they can only draw stick figures!
